Announcements

SOPPA (8/11/21)

Per Illinois law, websites that collect student data are now required to have a valid SOPPA agreement on file with each school. If a website does not have a valid SOPPA agreement, then the school staff are not allowed to enter any of the studentsâ€™ personal identifiable information.

If the name of the website is NOT listed below, please contact irene.yuska@elimcs.org for further guidance.

  • IXL
  • PowerSchool
  • Embrace IEP
  • Seesaw
  • Boom Learning
  • Reading A-Z
